title: Joe Nocera on Why We May See NCAA Sports This Fall
itunes:title: Joe Nocera on Why We May See NCAA Sports This Fall
description:
Jason Kelly sits down with Bloomberg Opinion Columnist Joe Nocera to talk NCAA athletics and the reopening of educational intuitions. He's the host of megahit soon to be a movie podcast The Shrink Next Door, Author, Indentured: The Battle to End the Exploitation of College Athletes, Also "All The Devils are Here: The Hidden History of the Financial Crisis" and many other books. Joe tells us why he believes, many universities might be open for business this fall.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
